name: LaBow
description:
LaBow is an arcade/ platformer video-game brought to you by DuckTalk Games! 

You are in a procedurally generated cylindrical test lab. Teleport to platforms in time to avoid the turbines and lasers!

How to Play:

Get as many orbs as you can! Avoid the lasers and the meat grinders
WASD: Movement keys 
Space: Jump, hit space in mid air to double jump
Right Mouse Button: Zoom and ready bow and teleport location
Left Mouse Button: Shoot and Teleport
W hold: Wall Run

The orbs give you points and ammo, points never go down but ammo does, when you teleport.

The game was made for the ScoreSpace game jam and we've streamed the whole process on https://www.twitch.tv/ducktalkgames.
